class.name: VisualScriptYield
class.brief_description: A Visual Script node used to pause a function execution.
class.description: [VisualScriptYield] will pause the function call and return [VisualScriptFunctionState], which can be used to resume the function.

members.member: The mode to use for yielding. See [enum YieldMode] for available options.
The time to wait when [member mode] is set to [constant YIELD_WAIT].

constants.constant: Yields a function and waits the given time.
